Field Detail

adj

public java.lang.String adj
adj The English word this adjective represents.

adjective_distance

public int adjective_distance
adjective_distance The priority the adjective is given in placement when multiple adjectives are placed one after the other. Lower values come first.

the_adj

public boolean the_adj
rear_adj Boolean indicating if this adjective can be used by the name generator as the rear part of a compound name.

front_adj

rear_adj Boolean indicating if this adjective can be used by the name generator as the rear part of a compound name.

public boolean rear_adj
rear_adj Boolean indicating if this adjective can be used by the name generator as the rear part of a compound name.
